game.name: Bad Teeth Makeover
game.description:
Like everyone else, you also love to have a brightening and sparkling teeth. You are ready to smile from your heart when you have white and healthy teeth. This also helps you to create some good pictures. But, not all the individuals are lucky enough to enjoy a refreshing smile. Here is a girl who is struggling with the problem in her teeth. Join Bad Teeth Makeover and help the girl to get their lovely smile back! Do your best to allow her smile like the famous celebrities in this brand new doctor game for girls! 

Follow the instructions available with this game and clean her teeth in the optimum possible way. Give her a regular dental hygiene to make her teeth good looking and healthy! Play the role of her personal dentist and help get her teeth back in shape. Start this free online game by removing the calculus deposits from her teeth. Complete the scaling session and brush her teeth with one of the three professional kinds of toothpaste. Move the toothbrush in upward and downward direction and brush her teeth for 1-3 minutes. Now apply some water to rinse the foam and get ready then to attempt the whitening session in the next step.

Feel free to use two chic braces in order to ensure her perfect teeth along with a bright smile. Remove the braces after one year and you will see her smiling with the shining and white teeth. Once it is done, get ready to do her make-up and choose the outfit that could help her smile with a celebrity look. Give her a matching hairdo and choose from one of your favorite colors to create a perfect look. Choose from either a sweet pinkish color or bold red lipstick color for her lips. Dress her up with stylish dresses along with a matching necklace and glittering earrings for a hot summer day! Play this cool fun girl game and have a blast, girls!
